Hi Lizav

I did everything also and still asked for a serial number.  I tried both the numbers listed in previous comments and also any characters with negative results.

I think most people have misunderstood the instructions.
1.) Extract the .ISO from the .exe.
2.) Mount the .ISO.
3.) Copy the files in the crack folder on the ISO into the system32 directory making sure that they are read-only.
4.) Start the installer and when asked to input Serial input anything you want.

I can confirm that this crack does work 100%.

Okay guys - Here's the skinny:  First of all, thanks Lizav!  This is a great upload, and the crack is 100%.  Now, I believe the main problem is in the fact that the crack instructions are for Windows XP or earlier, and 32bit versions.

I had the same problem, as some other prople.  I extracted agsyspr6.iso and agsyspr6.md5 from agsyspr6.iso.exe.

I then used Daemon tools 4.5 to mount agsyspr6.iso.  Next, I browsed the mounted cd rom image, and found the \Crack folder.  Inside are three files:
instructions.txt , libsyslic1.dll, and libsyslic1.original.dll

As instructed, I copied libsyslic1.dll and libsyslic1.original.dll to the c:\windows\system32 folder  - however during install when prompted for the username, companyname and serial number, I consistintantly got the "wrong serial number" error message.  Yes, I did enter a company name in to the company name dialogue box.

*** I am using Windows Vista 64 bit edition and this is where the fix is gang:******

I duplicated the files libsyslic1.dll, and libsyslic1.original.dll again, only this time I placed them in the C:\Windows\SysWOW64 folder -- leaving the files I copied to C:\Windows\System32 entact.

You'll notice that if you tried the install and failed the serial crack using Vista or XP 64 bit - that in the C:\Windows\SysWOW64 folder, a series of 5 or 6 files were created including libsyslic1.dll.  Simply copy over it / them with the cracked files.

****The short version of what I said here is - if you are using a Windows 64 bit OS - the crack needs to go in C:\Windows\SysWOW64 also.  :-)

I assure you this crack works 100% -   I'm sorry for the overly detailed instructions here - but I wanted to make this available to all you newbies out there who seem to be having issue also.  -- If ya still don't get it, well.  Post I guess.   

The Proof in my pudding =

Great program! I had a little difficulty in the beginning with the install instructions, I thought it was the msinfo and iso files which you had to copy direct into the system32 file and then extract from there. I was completely wrong. All you need to do is  double click the .iso file to extract it (within any directory). The resulting image file needs then to be burnt onto a dvd. When you have done this, mount the image using daemon tools. Go into the CRACK folder and copy the two .dll files that are there into the system32 folder and make them read only. Then, and only then, can you install the program sucessfully. How do you install it? Well, I opened my cd drive and then closed it again to activate auto run and it started the install process.
